channel.title: Site Problem
channel.description: Hi i recently downloaded the Classic Runescape Website and it requires SQL so i set that up but when i try to go to the site its saying something about DB_SERVER Error and this is what i have in the Database file can someone explain to me what im supposed to put for the DB_SERVER part? [code]$this->connection = mysql_connect(DB_SERVER, DB_USER, DB_PASS) or die(mysql_error()); mysql_select_db(DB_NAME, $this->connection) or die(mysql_error());[/code] those are the codes.

item.title: Site Problem
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“sageofmali, post:17, topic:398416”][quote author=FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz link=topic=495551.msg3624103#msg3624103 date=1307679934]

Is that you database? If you don’t have a database your need to get one (you can get one through a download of MySQL, but your PC needs to be online all the time for it to work… Try 000webhost.s

Well i checked my hosting site and its got Name Servers and MySQL Hostname would i put one of those in?

Yeah, use the mysql hostname.

I TRiED lOcaLhosT AnD itS noT workiNG AnD iM sOrrY FOR THe CaPitALs MY CaPs LocK Is STucK…

Not localhost… Use the MySQL Hostname. What’s it say that it is?

It says MySQL Username and then under it says localhost.

Are you trying to use it remotely, or locally?

well i am trying to use it publicly like im using FileZilla for my site files and it updates my website but its still not working could you help me through tv? cause i have tried everything.
[/quote]
Yeah, PM the info.[/quote]
Alright sorry about that last night i was tired but im going to have teamviewer running and im going to pm you the info so you can connect.

Read full topic

Yea. Kinda. If it would have more name to it then you would put the full name (like if you using 000webhost, theres a bunch of crap in front of it (like numbers)).
[/quote]
Yeah its not working cause im using 99k.org for my hosting and i tried 99k and 99k_org and 99k.org and they arent working[/quote]
It should be the host name, like how you have localhost. 99k.org is zymec, so try that or something.
